original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, votes as v, users as u WHERE u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND u.Id = c.UserId AND u.Id = v.UserId AND c.Score=0 AND p.ViewCount>=0 AND u.Reputation<=306 AND u.UpVotes>=0
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 0
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1.UserId=E3.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Reputation <= 306 AND users.UpVotes >= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E3.UserId=E4.Id)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.ViewCount >= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E4E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E3E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E3E4.UserId=E2.OwnerUserId)
